about_the_game:
Tiny Kingdoms is a peaceful building strategy and puzzle game where you transform a whimsical landscape into a thriving, ever-expanding kingdom, one tile at a time. Explore a variety of vibrant biomes, each with unique resources and challenges. As you unlock new tiles, strategically place them on the hexagonal grid to create harmonious settlements, sprawling farms, and bustling trade routes.

Strategic Tile Placement

Carefully plan your kingdom's layout. Each hexagonal tile offers distinct resources and building opportunities. Optimize your placement to forge productive chains, like placing farms near mills to generate flour for bakeries.
Resource Management: Gather and utilize wood, stone, crops, and other resources to construct buildings, expand your settlements, and keep your tiny citizens happy and productive.

Vibrant Biomes

Uncover lush forests, sparkling rivers, rugged mountains, and more! Each biome presents its own advantages and obstacles, requiring you to adapt your building strategies.
Unlockable Tiles: As you progress, discover and unlock new tiles, expanding your construction options and enabling you to create more complex and impressive structures.

Relaxed Quest System

Embark on quests to propel your kingdom's growth. These quests will encourage you to explore different biomes, experiment with resource management, and hone your strategic tile placement skills.

Peaceful Gameplay

Focus on building and creating, not combat. Nurture your kingdom and watch your tiny people thrive in a charming and stress-free environment.

Tiny Kingdoms offers a perfect blend of strategic puzzle solving, resource management, and world-building satisfaction. Dive in and create your own enchanting kingdom, tile by tile!

name: Tiny Kingdoms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT550M | AMD Radeon R7/HD 5650 | Intel HD 520
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT740M | AMD Radeon R8 | Intel HD 630

short_description: Tiny Kingdoms is a peaceful building strategy and puzzle game where you build an enchanting and ever-expanding kingdom by placing tiles on a hexagonal grid. Explore diverse, vibrant biomes, discover and unlock new tiles, and complete quests to bring your world to life!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
